titlestmt.titleproper: NYU Abu Dhabi Campus Posters Collection

repository.corpname: NYU Abu Dhabi, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: NYU Abu Dhabi Campus Posters Collection

physdesc.extent: in 4 legal size document boxes, 3 oversize boxes, and 3 folders in oversize map case drawer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The NYU Abu Dhabi University Archives Campus Poster Collection has been compiled by NYU Abu Dhabi Archives and Special Collections staff from a variety of sources. The collection consists of posters and flyers publicizing various campus events, such as lectures, performances, exhibitions, cultural evenings, campaigns, and other activities in the community. Dates of the physical posters start at 2018, while some of the digital copies are from as early as 2014.
The collection is arranged by year, and by semesters within.
A related collection is the "NYU Abu Dhabi Student Groups and Student Activities" collection, which includes digital copies of student group posters, 2014-2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; NYU Abu Dhabi Campus Posters Collection; RG 002-2; box number; folder number or identifier; Archives and Special Collections, New York University Abu Dhabi Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: A number of Archives and Special Collections staff have contributed to the acquisition, sorting, and arrangement and description of this collection, including Brad Bauer, Lauren Kata, Chhete Sherpa, Stefan Mitikj, Yogesh Dhungana, Gelila Kebede, Polina Pinskikh, Deanndra Kidd, and Khusanboy Kotibjonov.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for NYU Abu Dhabi University records is held by NYU Abu Dhabi. Permission to use or publish materials must be obtained by contacting NYU Abu Dhabi Archives and Special Collections. Email: nyuad-asc-group@nyu.edu

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Materials related to the Campus Posters Collection include NYUAD Publications and Ephemera [RG 002.1], Records of NYU Abu Dhabi Student Groups and Student Activities [RG 009.3.1], and the Student Life Events Photos [AD.RG.009.3-2-1].

physdesc.extent: in 3 document boxes, 2 oversize boxes, and 3 folders in oversize map case drawer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection of posters is comprised of posters gathered across campus spaces such as bulletin boards and inside elevators. Some posters may have also been donated from time to time by campus community members and integrated into this series.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: When known, campus posters are arranged by month/year. Posters with unknown dates are filed in "general" folders.
